        Refreshes the user's data
        Parameters:
        canned - true if using canned/test data
        date - date of the data retrieved in the format "yyyy-mm-dd"
        Returns:
        An array of strings storing the user's data

      • getHeartRateZones

        public HeartRateZones[] getHeartRateZones(java.lang.String date,
                                          boolean canned)
                                   throws org.json.JSONException
        creates an array of heart rate zones storing each zone because only the default ones are used 0 will store Out of Range, 1 will store Fat Burn, 2 Cardio, 3 Peak
        Parameters:
        date - determines what day to use
        canned - true if using canned/test data
        Returns:
        heart rate zones
        Throws:
        org.json.JSONException

      • getTimeSeriesData

        public TimeSeries_Record[] getTimeSeriesData(boolean zoomed,
                                             java.lang.String date,
                                             java.lang.String detailLevel,
                                             java.lang.String startTime,
                                             java.lang.String endTime,
                                             boolean canned)
        Retrieves the TimeSeriesData
        Parameters:
        zoomed - True if zoomed, false otherwise
        date - Date of data to be pulled
        detailLevel - Level of detail for the time series data
        startTime - Starting time of the time series
        endTime - Ending time of the time series
        canned - True if using canned data
        Returns:

      • getDailyGoals

        public DailyGoals getDailyGoals(java.lang.String date,
                                boolean canned)
                         throws org.json.JSONException
        Creates the Daily Goals from the DailyGoals class constructor
        Parameters:
        date - date of the daily goals data to be pulled
        canned - true if using canned data
        Returns:
        the created Daily Goals
        Throws:
        org.json.JSONException

      • isAtGoal

        public java.lang.String[] isAtGoal(double[] data,
                                   java.lang.String date,
                                   java.lang.Boolean canned)
                            throws org.json.JSONException
        Checks if user is at daily goal
        Parameters:
        data - array of data user currently has accrued (steps, etc.)
        date - date of the data to be pulled
        canned - Whether canned data is used or not
        Returns:
        an array of strings detailing progress on daily goals. [0] = Calories [1] = Distance [2] = Floors [3] = Steps
        Throws:
        org.json.JSONException
